title: Aurora Content Schema
description: Schema for both Vibe of the Day and Daily Pick content items in Project Aurora.

contentItem.description: A reusable definition for a single content item.

id.description: Unique identifier for the content item.

snippet.description: A short snippet or summary of the content.

image_url.description: URL to the image associated with the content.

article_url.description: URL to the full article or source of the content.

VibeOfTheDay.description: The featured Vibe of the Day content item.

DailyPicks.description: A list of daily curated content items.
